Name: Willis Towers Watson PLC
Description: Willis Towers Watson PLC (WTW) is a premier global advisory, broking, and solutions firm specializing in risk management, insurance, and consulting services. Leveraging advanced data analytics and technology, WTW delivers innovative solutions across diverse sectors, including health, retirement, and talent management, effectively helping clients manage risks and optimize benefits. Operating in over 140 countries, the company serves a wide array of clients, from multinational corporations to small businesses, and is committed to driving sustainable growth and enhancing client engagement. With its robust strategic initiatives, WTW is positioned as a trusted partner for organizations navigating the complexities of today’s market.
Address: 51 LIME STREET, LONDON, UNITED KINGDOM, EC3M 7DQ
